experience.description:
The Automation test experience on the latest project:
•	Creating the Robot Automated tests
•	Created the launch mechanism to run Robot tests by TARA daily (Test Automation Reporting System)
•	Created integration of Robot tests into CI as follow: Jenkins – TARA – Robot suites

Prepared Robot tests cover: 
•	REST API testing
•	AWS handling (e.g., Parameter Store and Security group data retrieving)
•	The testing of Kafka events handling (adding and listening)

Additional Test Automation Activities: 
•	Creating Python supplementary files
•	Accepting Cypress (JS based Test Automation framework) tests that are prepared by Developer
•	Maintaining of Cypress tests
•	Using Cypress tests during regression

The other activities:
•	Manual Web-application front-end & back-end testing
•	SQL testing
•	Managing QA teams from 5 to 50 QA engineers
•	Maintenance the Java based UI automation tests
•	Ramp-up and supervision of newly joined and junior QA engineers
•	Defining and enhancing QA processes on projects
•	Presenting the test results to the internal and external Customer
•	Preparing and performing webinar related to testing theory and practice

industries.name: System Integration, Technological and Business Processes Automation, IT Consulting

experience.description:
The member of automation team.
This team has developed multicomponent testing system.

The system is targeted to perform:
•	The continuous integration
•	The earlier bug detecting
•	Data storage and analysis simplification 

The system's components:
•	Test performing system (Jenkins based)
•	DataBase for the storage of test results (PHP and MySQL based)
•	Report Generation server (Pentaho BI server)

Performed roles:
•	Technical writer
•	The maintainer of Report server.
•	SW developer (updating java-based SW) 
•	Tester of system’s components


Performed activities:
•	System requirements’ collection and analyzing
•	HLA discussion
•	Research the market of open source BI (Report) platforms
•	The test plan and test design developing
•	The test cases’ creating
•	The management of component’s testing flow
•	The internal review of test plans, documentation
•	The participating in testing of system’s components
•	The component’s documentation creating
•	User’s support

Used tools:
Java, MySQL, script languages, JavaScript

experience.company: Synopsys/Virage Logic (Virage Logic was acquired by Synopsys in Sept 2010).
experience.description:
Responsibilities 
• Embedded SW and desktop application testing
• Ensuring level of quality of the source code and testing multimedia software components 
• Development of manual and automated test suites in the area of regression testing
• Measuring performance, memory occupation and other parameters of multimedia software components on embedded platforms
• Everyday tracking the results of automated tests
• Producing and defining testing methodology
•Present test result and reports
• Participating in planning of activity on test department 
• Report progress during weekly Skype conferences to the multinational team and Test Manager 
• Everyday update of internal SharePoint pages
• The on-line and on-site training and supervision of newly joined QA engineers . 

Achieved results
• Created and modified more than 30 checklists and checklist’s templates.
• Tested more than 20 releases of SW.
• Prepared more than 10 automation scripts (Windows/Linux).
• Created 3 training presentations for starters.
• Downloaded and tested nodelocked and network licenses (according to requirements).
• Created an internal wikipage with cross information about the products.
• Organized and performed more than 10 pre-release Skype meetings.

• The creation Exchange Data Base for telephone exchange and preparation the ordering specifications; 
- Created more than 200 databases and order specifications without any remark from neighbor’s departments.
• Site survey (review of Customer site) for SDH/DWDM equipment. 
This equipment transfers multiple digital bit streams over optical fiber. Site survey includes creation blueprint for new equipment, checking contract’s specification and definining the areas of responsibility with Customer for implementation of contract;
- Performed more than 15 site surveys within different regions of Russia for different types of equipment.
• The creation of ‘User manual’ – set of documentation for new SDH and DWDM projects. Set includes 30-40pages with topology of network, detailed rack/shelf layouts, power/signal/optical cabling and etc. for exact site.
- Created more than 10 sets of documentation.
• Technical support for Customer, neighbor’s department and project organization..
